mergeProfile.title: EH CMS 2018 QRDA Category I
mergeProfile.generatedFilename: /Users/mholck/Development/qrda/Schematrons/CMS QRDA Category III/EC CMS 2017/Published/EC CMS 2017 QRDA Category III.sch
mergeProfile.fileHeader:
THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL ESAC INC., OR ANY OF THEIR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
Changes from version 0.1: Added the 77- prefix to the text of the assert for 77-17580 (QRDA-104) Added the check for [not(@extension)] to the templates that specifically do not have an extension (QRDA-110) (QRDA-488) Added a check to allow for no value provided to a-2233-711294-error and a-2233-711295-error (QRDA-497) Added conformance statements 3259-21402 and 3259-21403 to ACI Numerator Denominator Type Measure Reference and Results (QRDA-170) Corrected text missing in assert 3259-21422 for the typeCode (QRDA-171) Added effectiveTime from QRDA Category III Report V3 to the context for US Realm Date and Time (QRDA-172) Updated QRDA Category III Report template to V4 which updated required templates in 3338-21394 (QRDA-188) Updated Advancing Care Information Section to V2 which now requires a reporting parameters act template and a new version of the Advancing Care Information Numerator Denominator Type Measure Reference and Results template (QRDA-189) Updated Improvement Activity Section template to V2 which now requires a reporting parameters act template (QRDA-190) Updated QRDA Category III Measure Section template to V4 which now requires a reporting parameters act template (QRDA-191) Updated Advancing Care Information Numerator Denominator Type Measure Reference and Result template to V2 which removed the requirement for performance rate (QRDA-192) Updated rule to allow for multiple occurences of one of the templates in the ACI section assert 3259-21439 (QRDA-507)
